get.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Returns a list of Digital Twin Builder Flows from the specified workspace.
get.description:
This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).

## Permissions

 The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

Workspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: A token for retrieving the next page of results.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* InvalidItemType - Invalid item type.

post.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Creates a Digital Twin Builder Flow in the specified workspace.
post.description:
This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

 To create Digital Twin Builder Flow with a public definition, refer to [](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/digital-twin-builder-flow-definition) article. 

 ## Permissions 
 The caller must have a *contributor* workspace role. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

 DigitalTwinBuilderFlow.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All 

## Limitations 
- To create a Digital Twin Builder Flow the workspace must be on a supported Fabric capacity. For more information see: [Microsoft Fabric license types](/fabric/enterprise/licenses#microsoft-fabric-license-types).

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

202.description: Request accepted, Digital Twin Builder Flow provisioning in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid

* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used.

* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.

* WorkspaceItemsLimitExceeded - Workspace item limit exceeded

get.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Returns properties of the specified Digital Twin Builder Flow.
get.description:
## Permissions

 The caller must have *read* permissions for the digital twin builder flow. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

 DigitalTwinBuilderFlow.Read.All or DigitalTwinBuilderFlow.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: digitalTwinBuilderFlowId
parameters.description: The Digital Twin Builder Flow ID.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.

patch.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Updates the properties of the specified Digital Twin Builder Flow.
patch.description:
## Permissions

 The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the digital twin builder flow.

## Required Delegated Scopes

 DigitalTwinBuilderFlow.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: digitalTwinBuilderFlowId
parameters.description: The Digital Twin Builder Flow ID.

parameters.name: updateDigitalTwinBuilderFlowRequest
parameters.description: Update Digital Twin Builder Flow request payload.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found. 

* InvalidRequest - Invalid update request.

post.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Returns the specified Digital Twin Builder Flow public definition.
post.description:
This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

When you get a Digital Twin Builder Flow's public definition, the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.

## Permissions

 The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the digital twin builder flow. 

## Required Delegated Scopes

 DigitalTwinBuilderFlow.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: digitalTwinBuilderFlowId
parameters.description: The Digital Twin Builder Flow ID.

202.description: Request accepted. Retrieving the definition is in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item.

post.summary:
> [!NOTE]
> This API is in preview.

Overrides the definition for the specified Digital Twin Builder Flow.
post.description:
This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).

 
Updating the Digital Twin Builder Flow's definition, does not affect its sensitivity label. 

## Permissions

 The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the digital twin builder flow. 
## Required Delegated Scopes

 DigitalTwinBuilderFlow.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All

## Microsoft Entra supported identities

This API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.

| Identity | Support |
|-|-|
| User | Yes |
| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |

## Interface

parameters.name: digitalTwinBuilderFlowId
parameters.description: The Digital Twin Builder Flow ID.

parameters.name: updateMetadata
parameters.description: When set to true and the Digital Twin Builder Flow.platform file is provided as part of the definition, the item's metadata is updated using the metadata in the Digital Twin Builder Flow.platform file

parameters.name: updateDigitalTwinBuilderFlowDefinitionRequest
parameters.description: Update Digital Twin Builder Flow definition request payload.

202.description: Request accepted. Update definition is in progress.

Location.description: The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.

x-ms-operation-id.description: The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.

Retry-After.description: The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request.

default.description:
Common error codes:

* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item. 

* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.
